          <title>
            <string language="en">Animals with structural adaptations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tiere mit Strukturanpassungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux avec des adaptations structurales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animais com adaptações estruturais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animali con gli adeguamenti delle strutture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζώα με τις δομικές προσαρμογές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animales con adaptaciones estructurales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third in a series of four illustrations showing different animals with structural adaptations. Shown here is a polar bear.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">adaptations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polar bears</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white coat</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
unterschiedliche Tiere mit Strukturanpassungen zeigen. Hier 
gezeigt ein polarer Bär.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers dans une série de quatre illustrations 
montrant différents animaux avec des adaptations structurales. 
Montré ici est un ours blanc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third em uma série de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram animais diferentes com adaptações estruturais. É 
mostrado aqui um urso polar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terzo in serie di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano gli animali differenti con gli adeguamenti delle strutture. 
È indicato qui un orso polare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν διαφορετικά ζώα με τις δομικές προσαρμογές. 
Εμφανισμένη εδώ είναι μια πολική αρκούδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran diversos animales con adaptaciones estructurales. Se 
muestra aquí un oso polar.</string>
          </description>
